title: Learner-Centered English Education Design for Entrepreneurship Competency Development: Project-Based Learning for University Students

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Learner-led project execution and emphasis on collaborative learning in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment

learning_goals: Learners can analyze and present international business scenarios using English communication skills related to entrepreneurship.
Learners can assess the economic feasibility of entrepreneurial ideas by applying mathematical modeling.
Learners can develop team-based entrepreneurial strategies through learner-centered collaborative activities and incorporate feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
